column5: Welcome to a comfortable and spacious room with a private living room in a quiet residential neighborhood in the Las Colinas area. There is a plethora of restaurants, supermarkets, and shopping centers in less than a 5 minute drive. Bus stops and are available in 5-10 minutes walking distance and the light rail is a short bike ride away. Close to DFW airport (10 mins), Love field airport (20 mins), and downtown Dallas is only a 15 minute drive. Irving is centrally located in the DFW area.
